Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near Fillmore/Mason
ShortDescription: Southbound 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Fillmore, Mayfield, Roosevelt and Austin due to street blockage near Fillmore/Mason.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Fillmore, Mayfield, Roosevelt and Austin, street blockage near Fillmore/Mason.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Southbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 25th and King Drive, due to street blockage near McCormick Place.
